title: Peter Greenaway: The Early Works
brief_description: Three shorts: “Dear phone” (1976); “Water wrackets” (1978); “A walk through H” (1978). These films are an entertaining and intriguing mix of method and madness, pedantry and poetry, landscape beauty and bureaucratic fog. Questioning film forms and documentary traditions, Greenaway’s work is always intellectually sharp and visually superb.
